title: Can't disable language filter
body:
Currently using the old client and no matter what I set it to I continues to censor everything.
Tried re downloading the patch multiple times. Hasn't worked.

Any help would be awesome

replies.body:
Hey there,

I believe the in-client option to disable the language filter is currently broken, however typing **/chatfilter** while in game should allow you to enable/disable the chat filter.
